answers.answer: I am diabetic, too. Type 2. I was on Metformin but stopped when I found out I was pregnant. I let the dr know from the beginning. They put me back on it around 10 weeks and at 13 weeks decided that it would be best to put me on insulin. I am now 33 weeks pregnant and still on insulin but there have been no problems or complications. Try not to worry. I will gladly answer any question you may have. Good luck.
